original_title: Third school term for 2022 ends today (24)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The third school term of government and government approved schools for 2022 will end on Friday (24).
The Ministry of Education said the first school term for 2023 will commence on Monday (27).
The Ministry added that school students will receive the Sinhala and Tamil New Year holidays from the 5th to the 16th of April.
